reviews.review: The waiting staff were excellent and the wine and food on par. A very nice experience.
Excellent food, service and place! I can recommend the 13 dishes menu! I will come back soon for new experience :)
Brilliant food (and in vast quantities for the taster menu, so eat light earlier in the day!). Attentive, professional and friendly service.
This is our second visit. This time none of the dishes were too salty. So we were very satisfied with our experience
Nice and good value tasting menu. Nice ambience, good service and good food.
Went for the tasting menu with wine pairing. OK food - but great service!
Marco and Luca constantly work on improving their menu, and it really shows! Each time I eat there, I always want to come back!
